title: Constant PVP Disconnecting Issue
body:
Yall need to fucking fix the constant PVP disconnecting issue. Shit been going on for more then a year and there's still no fixes for it.
I'm sure there is a lot of people having this problem and it gets really annoying.

replies.body: There currently aren't any issues with the chat servers, but your network could be specifically having an issue connecting to it.  I suggest going over our [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to get this fixed up.  Let me know if you have any questions.

> [{quoted}](name=Porocles,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=fAnrMaGo,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-08-27T22:59:34.250+0000)
>
> There currently aren't any issues with the chat servers, but your network could be specifically having an issue connecting to it.  I suggest going over our [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to get this fixed up.  Let me know if you have any questions.

There is nothing wrong with my network. I play every other games on this pc perfectly fine. Everyone tries all the so call "fixes" and its just a waste of time as it doesn't work. After every game played it gets disconnected and will not load the result window and you have to skip the results or restart the client. Hextech repair tool? Useless. Reinstall? Useless. Try all methods of "fixes? Useless. Fix the client. I'm sure there will be a lot of people that agrees to this.
I must agree. Funny thing about it is, YOU are punishing ME bcs of it!
